communityTab.description: Know a scholarship available for undocumented students not yet in our database? Sign up and add them, become part of our community of scholarship contributers.
communityTab.title: Join and Support the Community

landingSection.subTitle: A resource list of scholarships by and for the community.
landingSection.title: Scholarships for undocumented students.

studentTab.description: Browse our database at ease, knowing none of our schoalrships require U.S. citizenship or permanent residency.
studentTab.title: Fewer barriers, more scholarships.
